battlesys
Class MoveStatus

java.lang.Object
  battlesys.Move
      battlesys.MoveNormal
          battlesys.MoveStatus
Direct Known Subclasses:
AllDisableAtk, AllDizzyAtk, AllParalysisAtk, AllPinAtk, AllPoisonAtk, ChargeAtk, DestroyTogether, DisableAtk, DizzyAtk, FreezeAtk, FreezeAtk2, FreezeAtk3, NatureAtk2, ParalysisAtk, PinAtk, PoisonAtk, StartAbsorb, StartProtect, StartReflect, StartShield, StartShield2, UnknownSign, WeakeningAtk, WeakeningAtk2, WeakeningAtk3
public abstract class MoveStatus
extends MoveNormal

For moves that are attacking and also inflict status to the target. For moves that inflict status only, those move are under this class, with setting doAtk to false in the respective constructor

protected  int statusEffect
          The status effect, using Player.statusId.STATUS_NAME.getId(), or RANDOM_BAD indicating a random bad status
protected  int statusRate
          rate of getting status, in percentage. 70 means 70% of probability

Field Detail

statusEffect

protected int statusEffect
The status effect, using Player.statusId.STATUS_NAME.getId(), or RANDOM_BAD indicating a random bad status

statusRate

protected int statusRate
rate of getting status, in percentage. 70 means 70% of probability

applyToSelf

protected boolean applyToSelf
Whether the move meant to apply status on oneself

doAtk

protected boolean doAtk
Whether the move contain an attack part

mustApply

protected boolean mustApply
for non-attacking moves, whether it is unaffected by morale of both sides. If it is set to true, the success rate of opponent getting the status will subject to statusRate only.

actOnOpponent

protected boolean actOnOpponent
For moves that apply to self, whether it act on opponent? (For DestroyTogether).
